chats.message: checking on your last complaint
ok, please check on it because it is inconvenient to me
I have a question about my account.
Sure, feel free to ask your question. We're here to help!
How do I reset my password?
To reset your password, go to the login page and click on 'Forgot Password.' Follow the instructions to reset it.
I'm having trouble accessing a specific feature on the website.
Could you please provide more details about the issue you're facing with that feature?
The 'Submit' button is not working when I try to upload a file.
Thank you for letting us know. We'll investigate the issue and get back to you shortly.
I need assistance with my order. It hasn't arrived yet.
I apologize for the inconvenience. Could you please provide your order number so I can look into it for you?
My order number is 123456789.
Thank you. Let me check the status of your order and get back to you shortly.
I'm having trouble accessing a specific feature on the mobile app.
Could you please provide more details about the issue you're facing with the mobile app feature?
The app crashes every time I try to open the settings.
Thank you for reporting this. We'll investigate the issue and work on a fix. Please bear with us.
How can I update my email address associated with my account?
To update your email address, go to your account settings and look for the 'Email' section. You can make the changes there.
